channel.title: Yahoo! Scammed me i think
channel.description: ok i recently made 2 websites and ysed yahoo small bussiness to host them both well they worked great for a month then 1 day i tried to get on them and they where gone! well then i tried to log into the account for the websites and it said invaled password but i know it was right and the same thing happned when i did the "forgot your password?" and it wont work any suggestions?

item.title: Yahoo! Scammed me i think
item.dc:creator: @mvp566 mvp566
item.description:
@mvp566 wrote:

shaubbie:

Hey have you concidered that you have been hacked. Or have you given your pass to any of your friends

ok i recently made 2 websites and ysed yahoo small bussiness to host them both well they worked great for a month then 1 day i tried to get on them and they where gone! well then i tried to log into the account for the websites and it said invaled password but i know it was right and the same thing happned when i did the “forgot your password?” and it wont work any suggestions?
[/quote]Check your email -_-. I’m pretty sure they’d send you a notice. If not, do what Alga said.[/quote]

ok i have and they keep sending bots and i havent been ahcked since there 2 diff accs and i only use them on a military comp (if that means n e thing) and i havent/never give my pass away

Read full topic
